channel.title: Compiling error
channel.description:
A few years ago I started to make my own retro's & compile and that kinda stuff. And I quited for a few years. Well, now I want to come back but the problem is: my laptop crashed & now all my stuff is gone, including the site for all java updates etc to compile.
I have java downloaded but it stil won't compile, I think I don't have the exact java thing downloaded. Can someone please help? Here's my compiler txt:
[code]@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit[/code]
Thanks in advance!

item.title: Compiling error
item.dc:creator: @Hello_RSPS Hello RSPS
item.description:
@Hello_RSPS wrote:

Thank you all <3 You all helped me allot It works now ^^

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling error
item.dc:creator: @metal_k0 metal k0
item.description:
@metal_k0 wrote:

Try Program files (x86) (C:\Program files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\javac.exe)

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling error
item.dc:creator: @Hello_RSPS Hello RSPS
item.description:
@Hello_RSPS wrote:

I only have: C:\Program files\Java\jre6\bin
And I can’t even find javac.exe in that folder? :3

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling error
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

Just one this one:

replace this with your own: C:\Program files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\javac.exe

@echo off TITLE Compiling "C:\Program files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling error
item.dc:creator: @Hello_RSPS Hello RSPS
item.description:
@Hello_RSPS wrote:

A few years ago I started to make my own retro’s & compile and that kinda stuff. And I quited for a few years.
Well, now I want to come back but the problem is: my laptop crashed & now all my stuff is gone, including the site for all java updates etc to compile.

I have java downloaded but it stil won’t compile, I think I don’t have the exact java thing downloaded.
Can someone please help? Here’s my compiler txt:

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

Thanks in advance!
